Changeset.Change: GWT 2 and liferay support
compatible with the new CM model.
Compatible with the new Index service
Supports batch jobs submission
Jobs can ask for user input values at runtime
FullText and Forward indexing is based on GCUBECollections and their views
Open search data source resource creation is updated. the opensearchDataSource service is used
The open search task is updated so that the user can provide a ws-resource ID to add a new provider under the given ID
Job designer editor is updated to support user labels.
A new task for fulltext indexing using the new fulltext index node is added
The fulltext indexing accepts as input collections from the Tree manager service
A new task for the new forward index is added
The forward index task accepts collections from the Tree manager service
The functionality to add a new forward index under the same node has been implemented
Removed all the types, datatypes and tasks that were using the old CM and index services
GWT version is updated
Use of the IC, index, DTS and OpenSearch client libraries instead of the services
Removed any unused task type
Changed the way the GCubeCollection data type is retrieved. It now uses generic resources with "DataSource" data type and type "opensearch"
Added the update tasks for the fulltext and forward indices
Updated the Full text tasks so as to use the new index and dts clients
Removed the Forward index tasks
Updated the OpenSearch task so as to use the new client
Added a clear button that deletes the persisted logs
Added support for the index creation of relational DB Data sources
Added support for the resource creation of the SRU Data sources
Added support for the index creation of the workspace documents
Minor change in the resource retrieval
